[size=5][color=white]This is NOT a mod - this is a MODDER RESOURCE [/color][/size]


Sorry for my bad english

I'm not an animator..This is only converted animation.I can't make animation.Sorry

Please Not ASK for Weapon,Walk Animation or other because I'm not able to make it......
I will not Reply to PM with requests. Sorry

This is NOT for Elder Scrolls Purist , this is only for FUN!!! So save your COMMENTS on lore and immersion.... xD

Thanks to uimacjp , Arakabu,RSV ,Vindkald for tools and animation script
